messages.subject: Chibi ~ Senior Citizen Shinsengumi
messages.msgSnippet: Just because they don t have all their teeth anymore or need to take naps doesn t mean that they aren t cute. The first ever Miki fanart.....senior citizen
messages.messageBody:
Just because they don't have all their teeth anymore or need to take
naps doesn't mean that they aren't cute.

The first ever Miki fanart.....senior citizen HABUTAE MIKI
former police chief
hospital donor
drove bandits from his home with his sword
bonsai hobbysit
and enjoys raising...chickens
http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/chibiMiki.jpg

Grandpa Nagakura
enjoys watching silent films
and taking walks with his grandson (and having his picture taken)
...one day a bunch of
street punks were rude and refused to get out of their way, aged
Nagakura was left with no choice...
http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/chibiNagakura.jpg

Lastly, Mr. and Mrs. Fujita, their kids are all grown and left the nest
enjoy taking strolls together (well Tokio enjoys the walks)
Mr. Fujita "Look Tokio, according to the future authoritative texts
Meiji era husbands and wives are rarely seen in public together except
during family gatherings or holidays"
Mrs. Fujita (grabs his hand) "Oh, nonsense let's take jinrikshaw and
go shopping---::assumes menacing tone:: otherwise I'll have to cut
your cigarette allowance"
http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/chibiMrMrsFujita.jpg
